resources.string: Don\'t have an account? Get one now!
Already a user? Sign in now!
Hi do you want a tutorial to learn about some of the functions in this app?

This is a map that is made interesting by you as a user. You can pinpoint interesting spots, funny spots, good deals, events, hangouts, good mushroom areas or whatever you want to pinpoint. Your imagination is the limit!
You pinpoint a location by pressing your finger at it for 3 seconds and transform it into an event by choosing a time for it in the next menu.
If you want to filter shown locations you can search and add hashtags in the top menu. The map will then only show those locations that are connected to these hashtags.
The star button in the top menu can filter which groups locations you want to see and if you only want to se event or locations.
If you want to see more information about a pinpoint you can press it and a popup will appear with all available information.
Now you are ready to begin! Remember, this app is made great by you and your contribution!
You have to set a title to continue
Your title may only contain 40 characters!
Your title have to consist of at least two characters!
Your description may only contain 400 characters!
Your end date is before your start date!
Your end time is before your start time!
Please finish filling in the start/end times/dates.
You can not set a starting date before the current day!
You can not set a starting time before the current time!
You need to add at least one tag!
You have failed to register, please try again
You have failed to login, please try again
You have to login or register to continue!
You are too far away from this event to check in
You may not add this tag!
